net.livebookstore.dao.hibernate
Class GenericHibernateDao<T>

java.lang.Object
  net.livebookstore.dao.hibernate.GenericHibernateDao<T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
AccountDaoImpl, BookDaoImpl, CategoryDaoImpl, CommentDaoImpl, OrderDaoImpl
public abstract class GenericHibernateDao<T>
extends java.lang.Object

This base class is prepared for subclass to do CRUD easily.

Author:
xuefeng

executeUpdate

protected int executeUpdate(java.lang.String updateHql,
                            java.lang.Object[] values)
Do an update hql query, return the affected rows.

Parameters:
updateHql - Update HQL.
values - Parameters or null if none.

queryForList

protected java.util.List queryForList(java.lang.String selectCount,
                                      java.lang.String select,
                                      java.lang.Object[] values,
                                      Page page)
Prepared for sub-class for convenience. Query for list and also return total results' number.

Parameters:
selectCount - HQL for "select count(*) from ..." and should return a Long.
select - HQL for "select * from ..." and should return object list.
values - For prepared statements.
page - Page object for store page information.

queryForList

protected java.util.List queryForList(java.lang.String select,
                                      java.lang.Object[] values,
                                      Page page)
Prepared for sub-class for convenience. Query for list but do not return total results' number.

Parameters:
select - HQL for "select * from ..." and should return object list.
values - For prepared statements.
page - Page object for store page information.

queryForObject

protected java.lang.Object queryForObject(java.lang.String select,
                                          java.lang.Object[] values)
Prepared for sub-class for convenience. Query for unique result.

Parameters:
select - HQL for "select * from ..." and should return unique object.
values - For prepared statements.
